mapper.select: SELECT /* ProductCommonMapper.xml, selectMenuInfo, Tae hee Lee, 2013-12-24 */ ia.* , (SELECT menu_nm FROM TB_DP_MENU WHERE menu_id = ia.up_menu_id AND use_yn = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS up_menu_nm FROM (SELECT a.menu_id , a.menu_nm , a.menu_eng_nm , a.menu_desc , a.menu_depth , a.up_menu_id FROM TB_DP_MENU a WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND menu_id = #{menuId} ) ia
